description: [SDBbot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0461) has the ability to use application shimming for persistence if it detects it is running as admin on Windows XP or 7, by creating a shim database to patch services.exe.(Citation: Proofpoint TA505 October 2019)

external_references.description: Schwarz, D. et al. (2019, October 16). TA505 Distributes New SDBbot Remote Access Trojan with Get2 Downloader. Retrieved May 29, 2020.
